name: DimensionShifter
description:
DimensionShifter

A roguelike game with the ability to shift between dimension to find new paths. 

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to shoot

E to interact with Doors, Signs, NPCs, Weapons and Items

ESC to pause

Credits:

Base sprite assets was provided by the Kenney 1-bit Pack for this jam.

OldCityTheme music was provided by remaxim, CaveTheme music was provided by Brandon756899 and BossBattleTheme was provided by cynicmusic and everyone can be found at OpenGameArt.org.

The game was made for the GameJam MizJam1 in under48 hours.
